action: Basic life support initiated, airway cleared, rescue breathing provided. Medical team arrived within 5 minutes.
Direct pressure applied, limb elevated, tourniquet used. Patient stabilized and transferred to hospital.
Placed in recovery position, periodically monitored. No spinal injury. Patient regained consciousness after 7 minutes.
Arm cooled under water, covered with sterile bandage. No blisters broken. Patient referred for further evaluation.
